text: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb.
author: Yul Brynner

text: Men trust their ears less than their eyes.
author: Herodotus

text: Our whole constitutional heritage rebels at the thought of giving government the power to control men's minds.
author: Thurgood Marshall

text: At every crossroads on the path that leads to the future, tradition has placed 10,000 men to guard the past.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

text: Every woman needs one man in her life who is strong and responsible. Given this security, she can proceed to do what she really wants to do-fall in love with men who are weak and irresponsible.
author: Richard J. Needham
